FILE: cm365625v11.0.txt
DYAD: SUDAN-RUSSIA/USSR

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180520
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180920

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID4360 

TERRMID: MID4360 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4360 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID4360 from cm narrative, Sudan impounded a Russian helicopter and its 13 member crew on July 24, 2003 as it flew over Sudanese territory en route to a UN mission in the DRC. The crew and helicopter was released on July 29, 2003. Coded not territory because they were not disputing a boundary, and this was connected to a violation of Sudanese airspace. 

TERRLINK: MID4360 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4360 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4360 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4360 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4360 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4360 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4360 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4360 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID4360 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4360 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4360 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4360 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4360 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4360 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4 2002-2010:

MID4360
rivalry=365625 nationa=SUDAN nationb=RUSSIA/USSR MID4360 20030724-20030729 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=USE OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0
lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

Sudan impounded a Russian helicopter and its 13 member crew on July 24, 2003 as it flew over Sudanese territory en route to a UN mission in the DRC. The crew and helicopter was released on July 29, 2003. First day of dispute was on 7/24/2003 and last day of dispute was on 7/29/2003.
